name: IMPACT (itch)
description:
IMPACT is a game where the goal is to search the structures to find their weak points in order to destroy them, in a world that repairs itself.

Genre: Action-shooter / boss-rush

Controls:

  • Left trigger: Propulsion
  • Right trigger: Apply force

Left stick to move, right stick to aim.

/!\ A CONTROLLER IS REQUIRED TO PLAY THIS GAME /!\

Core mechanics and sounds are tied to analog inputs only a game controller can reproduce

Have fun and keep in mind that it's only a prototype

Music not owned by us

Game made by Félix Joubert, Antoine De Seguins, Nicolas Decelle & Rémi Stucky
